metadata.description: Based on Compass Point: West™, a visually stunning 3D action strategy game from Next Games set in the Wild West, IDW Publishing presents Compass Point: West #0, a free digital comic containing two rootin' tootin' and six-gun shootin' tales that introduce the game's rich story, fun line of characters, and colorful world! Written by Tom Waltz (Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles) with art by exciting newcomer Philip Murphy!
metadata.name: Next Games: Compass Point West
